column8: 2008 celebrated the 30th anniversary of `Space invaders`. One of the earliest two dimensional graphics shooting game! This game changed history, it was one of the forerunners of modern video gaming........ these days its pretty simplistic but is still played by many fans from around the globe, including me! You can play Space Invaders online now, try not to get hooked.....
column21: 2008 celebrated the 30th anniversary of `Space invaders`. One of the earliest two dimensional graphics shooting game! This game changed history, it was one of the forerunners of modern video gaming, and so worth some serious admiration. Hence this t shirt from weadmire.net.
